{{Infobox Secondary school | name = Tucker Middle School | picture = | principal = Dr. Kathy Cunningham | established = 2004 | type = Public | grades = 6â8 | address = 2160 Idlewood Road | city = [[Tucker, Georgia]] | country = [[United States|USA]] | enrollment = 1,100 | campus = Suburban | mascot = [[Tiger]]s | colors = [[Maroon (colour)|Maroon]] and [[Gold]]
{{color box|maroon}} {{color box|gold}} | website = [http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/tuckerms/ Tucker Middle School] | coordinates = {{Coord| 33.504802|-84.216157|display=title,inline|format=dms|type:edu}} }} '''Tucker Middle School''' is the only public [[Middle School]] in [[Tucker, Georgia|Tucker]], [[DeKalb County, Georgia|DeKalb County]], [[Georgia (U.S. state)|Georgia]], [[United States]] and is operated by the [[DeKalb County School System]].Milton Moe-Perez, "Dekalb County School System", "[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/ Dekalb COunty School System]" Tucker Middle has about 1100 students, about 800 of which are [[African American]].Milton Moe-Perez,"SchoolDigger", "[http://www.schooldigger.com/go/GA/schools/0174003338/school.aspx/ Schooldigger Site]" ==Curriculum== Tucker Middle School has four main subjects, as with most schools, which are Math, Science, Language Arts (English), and Social Studies. All of these classes are taught in three levels of academic expertise. These levels are Average, High Achiever, and Gifted. Tucker Middle School also offers advanced courses in mathematics. TMS also offers a variety of exploratory classes. "Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/tuckerms/ Tucker Website]" ==Exploratories== Tucker Middle offers a variety of exploratory classes.Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", [http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/tuckerms/staff/exploratory.html/ Tucker Middle Exploratories] These classes are Business Education",Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~COURTNEY_J_JOHNSON/S0F60659A/ Business Education Website]" Technology EducationâRobotics, Family and Consumer Science, ESOL",Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~SOPHIA_N_WALLACE/S1078D233/ TMS ESOL]" French",Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~SUSANNA_N_MILLER/ TMS French]" Spanish, German, Art",Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~MARYANN_DENNIS/ TMS Art]" Math Tools",Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~DEBORAH_A_MAU/ TMS Math Tools]" and Reading tools".Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~IRISH_PHARR/ TMS Reading Tools]" ==Athletics== Tucker Middle School offers a variety in sports for girls and boys. Some of the most predominant sports teams in the school are football, boys' and girls' basketball,and cheerleading. These three programs show greatness and overall improvement. The Tucker Tigers football team is coached by Michael Gembala, as well as Jermaine Walker, Stanley Hudson, and Roderick Russell.Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff","[http://schools.dekalb.k12.ga.us/tuckerms/FOOTBALL.html/ TMS Football Page]" The Cheerleading Squad is coached by Jacqueline HunteMilton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://schools.dekalb.k12.ga.us/tuckerms/FOOTBALL.html/ TMS Cheerleading Page]" ==Music== The Tucker Middle School Music family consists of Band,Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff","[http://www.tmsband.com/ Tucker Middle School Band]" Orchestra, and Chorus. The Band is led by Lawrence Jennings, the Orchestra by Min Kang, and the Chorus by Karen Bailey-Summers. The Band is split into four main ensembles. These are Concert Band, Symphonic Band, Pep Band, and Jazz Band. The Orchestra is led by Min Kang, who began directing on the start of the 2010â2011 school year, leaving her previous occupation of Assistant Band Director. The Chorus is led by Karen Bailey-Summers,Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff","[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~KAREN_BAILEY-SUMMERS/ Tucker Middle School Chorus]" and performs a variety of musicals such as Alice in Wonderland. Karen Baily-Summers moved to Mongolia in 2010- 2011 school year. The chourus position is now held by Timothy Simmons. ==Foreign languages== TMS teaches French, Spanish, and German. French is taught by Susanna Miller",Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff", "[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~SUSANNA_N_MILLER/ TMS French]" Spanish by Adrienne Schmidt and Gianna Brown. German is taught by Paulina Behnk. ==International Baccalaureate== TMS is currently a candidate of being accepted as an International Baccalaureate school. Coordinating this movement is Ruth Mason,Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff","[http://fc.dekalb.k12.ga.us/~RUTH_D_MASON/ TMS IB]" a teacher at TMS. They are part of the Dekalb County School System IB movement.Milton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff","[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/support/ib/news/archive07-08.html/ DCSS IB Movement] ==Awards and recognition== Tucker Middle School has won a variety of awards in Band, Science Fair, Robotics, Reading Bowl, Orchestra, and more. Here is a list of their accomplishmentsMilton Moe-Perez, "TMStaff","[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/tuckerms/aboutus.html/TMS Awards]" : 2008â2009 Academic Year *Reading Bowl 2nd Place at county, 3rd Place at regionals *Social Studies Fair - Lucy B., Gracie W.,Forrest L., Gabrielle G. to county *Science Fair Project went to state level - Avery P. Eleven students received awards for their science fair projects submitted to the Dekalb County *Scholastic Art Competition - Isis J. - 2 golds, 1 silver; AD B. - silver; Nejr M. - honorable mention; The only middle school to win awards in this competition 2005â2006 Academic Year *BandâBoth 7th and 8th Grade Band Receive Excellent Rating *Orchestraâ2005â2006 Received a Superior Rating and Awarded Blue Ribbon *Social Studies Fair-Cailey Forstall and Teferi Taylor competed in the Regional Social Studies Fair *Robotics Teamâ1st Place ==Tucker High School== Tucker Middle School feeds into [[Tucker High School]]. ==Annex== Tucker Middle School has an annex for children to attend when they are not able to reach the school. ==Feeder schools== The following elementary schools feed into Tucker Middle School ===Elementary schools=== * BrockettMilton Moe-Perez, "Brockett Bobcats!","[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/brockett/ Brockett Elementary Homepage]" * IdlewoodMilton Moe-Perez,"Idlewood Mustangs!","[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/idlewood/ Idlewood Elementary Homepage]" * LivseyMilton Moe-Perez, "Livsey Leapords!","[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/livseyes/ Livsey Elementary Homepage]" * MidvaleMilton Moe-Perez,"[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/midvale/ Midvale Elementry Homepage]" * Smoke RiseMilton Moe-Perez, "Smoke Rise Flames!","[http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/smokerise/ Smoke Rise Elementary]" == References == {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://www.dekalb.k12.ga.us/tuckerms/ Tucker Middle School] * [http://www.trulia.com/schools/GA-Tucker/Tucker_Middle_School/ TMS Student/Parent Feedback] * [http://webevent.dekalb.k12.ga.us/webevent/scripts/webevent.plx?userid=guest&calID=689&cmd=listmonth&show_favorites=1/ TMS Calendar] [[Category:Articles created via the Article Wizard]] [[Category:Schools in DeKalb County, Georgia]] [[Category:Middle schools in Georgia (U.S. state)]]
